thread.title: Global Stocks Fall on Trade Data
thread.title_full: Global Stocks Fall on China Trade Data - WSJ

author: Riva Gold
title: Global Stocks Fall on Trade Data
text:
Global stocks fell on Tuesday after the release of fresh evidence that China’s economy is slowing.
The Stoxx Europe 600 was down 0.3% in early trade, tracking Asian bourses lower.
Official data showed Tuesday that China’s exports dropped 3.7% in...
